Hiyr – Your AI-Powered Job Search Assistant

Hiyr transforms the way you search for jobs with smart features designed to save time and maximize results:

Auto-Fill Applications: Skip the hassle of manual input—Hiyr instantly fills out job applications on supported platforms, ensuring accuracy and speed.

Application Tracking: Stay organized with a built-in tracker that monitors your submitted applications in real-time.

Insights & Analytics: Get actionable data on your applications, including response rates and progress updates, so you can refine your job search strategy.

Streamline your job search, stay in control, and let Hiyr help you land your next opportunity faster!
